name: Austoria SS
description:
Scratchy Studios proudly presents Austoria Side Story (tentative name).

Austoria Side Story (or Austoria SS for short). was created in SRPGStudio and is similar to other strategy games like the Fire Emblem series.

This game is one chapter long and it is completed, but future updates will be made later on (such as more character art, gameplay balancing, and more). To follow the progress of Austoria SS and Austoria, visit the Austoria Discord server here.

Austoria SS is a prequel to the main game, Austoria (tentative name). The events in this game take place a few months before the main game starts. It is not required to play the main game first, nor will you have to play this side story first. Austoria and Austoria SS can be played in any order.

The game focuses on Prince Klaus and Princess Lunarelle, the royals of the kingdom of Antolly, and their journey to the island of Crete. The two of them had plans to meet with the nobles of House Aeolus. What they didn’t plan for, however, was the disaster that was to unfold following their arrival...

Please fill out this survey after you complete the game. All feedback and constructive criticism is helpful. Thank you! 

Warning: This game depicts characters with blood if they are injured and/or killed in battle. While the blood and wounds the characters have may not be too graphic (the same amount of blood shown in a traditional Japanese anime series) and it's mostly clothing damage, viewer discretion is advised.

Characters (both male and female) may be depicted in suggestive clothing (fan service).

This game also includes themes such as violence, murder, harassment. No graphical nor explicit written description of such scenes is done.

It is recommended that you are 15 years or older to play this game. Player discretion is advised.
